about_the_game:
Welcome to the Pecunian Empire, travelling merchant. Head between our many cities, expand your collection of wares and grow your riches. If your talent and skill are sharp enough, you may be in with a shot of winning the Wandering Merchant Quest. Along your journey, take on quests for locals, find unique items to sell and build a band of travelling companions but be extra careful - not everything is as it seems in the peaceful and prosperous land.

HONE YOUR SILVER TONGUE

Profit, profit, profit! Fine-tune your haggling skills and charisma to sway customers and make bags of money. Visit the auction house, interact with customers and stock the hottest commodities. During your growth as a merchant you’ll come across quests that will allow you to gain unique items or add boons to your skills. 

WARES ON WHEELS

Your caravan is your shop and the world is your oyster, live a nomadic lifestyle and upgrade along the way. Gather relics, goods and oddities from across the empire, ensuring your shop is THE place to go.

DABBLE IN THE MYSTICS

Magical, cursed and forgotten objects may fall into your hands along the way. Use them alongside magical potions to your advantage. If you need an extra hand you can hire particularly talented individuals to help you complete your quests!

MAKE FRIENDS. BUILD RIVALRIES

The Empire is a split land. Use your charm to navigate the factions and choose who you will ally with. Beware! Based on how you interact with other competitors who share your quest, you’ll forge lasting connections or build strong rivalries.
